alert.note: Alert for Clay; Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 5:50AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Owsley, southwestern Estill, central Jackson, southwestern Lee and northwestern Clay Counties through 615 AM EDT... At 550 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Foxtown, or near McKee, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lakes, Bradshaw, Wind Cave and Atkinstown around 555 AM EDT. New Zion, Turkey Foot, Privett, Arvel, Old Orchard, Gray Hawk and Mildred around 600 AM EDT. Wild Dog, Earnestville, Mummie, Banford, Herd, Zekes Point and Tyner around 605 AM EDT. Travellers Rest, Sturgeon, Green Hall, Vincent, Elian, Delvinta, Nathanton, Ida May, Maulden and Cressmont around 610 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Booneville, Endee, Scoville, Blake, Levi, Island City, Pebworth, Sourwood, Lower Buffalo and Sextons Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
